Class Deck

java.lang.Object
  Deck

public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object

This is the class Deck of the Assignment 1 project. This class models a deck of 52 cards

Version:
5/18/2014
Author:
Voicu Chirtes

Constructor Detail

Deck

public Deck()
Default constructor with no parameters

Method Detail

addAllCardsToDeck

public void addAllCardsToDeck()
Method that adds all the cards to the deck. This method ensures the deck will have ONLY and ALL the valid cards in the deck after its execution.

addOneCardToDeck

public void addOneCardToDeck(Card cardToAdd)
Method that adds one card to the deck. It verifies for card to be non-null and for the deck to be not full.

Parameters:
cardToAdd - the Card object to add

getFirstCard

public Card getFirstCard()
Accessor method that returns the first card from the deck. If the deck is empty the method returns null

Returns:
the first Card in the deck or null if deck is empty

showAllCardsInDeck

public void showAllCardsInDeck()
Accessor method that displays all the cards from the deck.

shuffleDeck

public void shuffleDeck()
Method to shuffle the cards in the arraylist so that they are randomized
